valueProp: Larson Larimer Schneider, P.C. based in Denver, Colorado has been providing experienced legal representation to the Metro Denver Area since 2004. The attorneys at our firm have over 100 years of combined experience in various areas of law, including complex personal injury to wrongful death litigation. We have numerous successful results, having secured more than $250 million on behalf of injured individuals and their families throughout Colorado, and we are ready to fight for the maximum settlement or verdict you are owed.

testimonalData.text: I'm thankful for Vance and Sheeda for their counsel, assistance and persistence in walking with me through the process and settlement of my accident claim. I highly recommend them without reservation!
testimonalData.author: d m

testimonalData.text: I had worked with Vance and Sheeda for about a year after a pretty nasty car accident. I was very new to the process and often didn't understand the processes, procedures, and timelines. Vance and Sheeda were very patient with me as well as very thoughtful through the difficulties I experienced. While I hope I will not need a legal team for anything anytime soon, I will be sure to think of Larson Larimer and Schneider first and you should too!
testimonalData.author: Matt Reilly

testimonalData.text: After my accident I they helped me to understand and take care of the whole process of insurance, doctors, bill paying, etc. The provided excellent support and was able to get me a settlement as a resolution. Thank you to the whole team.
